 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַבּוּעַ‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==spring of water== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***namba'u***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup> HWB 442</sup>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Eccl.12.6|Eccl 12:6]] plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַבּוּעֵי מַיִם‎</span> [[Isa.35.7|Isa 35:7]]; [[Isa.49.10|Isa 49:10]] (for returning exiles). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִבְשָׁן‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בשׁן‎</span>
